description:
The Walking Dead ended its 2016 run with a gut-wrenching (and gut-spilling) episode that saw Rick (Andrew Lincoln) finally come to the realization that it was time to rise up and take down Negan (Jeffrey Dean Morgan). Better late than never, Rick!《行尸走肉》2016年的所有集已经播出完毕，Rick终于意识到要奋起反抗Negan的压迫了。虽然晚了点，但是总比继续沉寂下去好！

 Here are five important things to expect in the rest of Season 7.以下5点是我们希望能在第七季下半部中看到的。

1. Negan will make it out of Season 7 alive.1. Negan将会活过第七季。

2. Plotting... lots of plotting.密谋...相当多的密谋剧情。

3. Eugene will be the key.3. Eugene是关键。 

4. Negan will face a threat from within.4. Negan会遭遇来自内部的威胁。

5. A new group might introduce itself.5. 可能会出现新团体。
